t: A song of ascents. Of Solomon.
Unless*pn the Lord*s builds a house, its*ln builders labor over it in vain; unless*ln the Lord*s watches over a city, the*ln watchman stays alert in vain.
In*ln vain you get up early and stay up late, working*ln hard to have enough food - yes,*ln he gives sleep to the one he loves.
Sons*pn are indeed a heritage from the Lord,*s offspring,*ln a reward.
Like*ln arrows in the hand of a warrior are*ln the sons born in one’s youth.
Happy*ln is the man who has filled his quiver with them. They*ln will never be put to shame when*ln they speak with their enemies at the city gate.
